shareForm.copyQRCode: Copy the link below or download the QR code.
shareForm.warningMessage: There is no published version of the form at this time. The link below will not be reachable until a version is published.

manageFormActions.deleteMessageA: Are you sure you wish to delete
manageFormActions.deleteMessageB: This form will no longer be accessible.

formSettings.info: If you will be using this form to gather information from the general public on topics that are of general interest to the public, you are required to contact the GCPE so that your engagement can be listed on
formSettings.idimNotifyA: You must notify the Identity Information Management(IDIM) team by email
formSettings.idimNotifyB: your intent to leverage BCeID to verify theidentities of your form submitters.
formSettings.formSubmissinScheduleMsg: The Form Submissions Schedule will be available in the Form Settings after the form is published.
formSettings.infoB: the option for the user to email themselves a submission confirmation

apiKey.infoA: Ensure that your API key secret is stored in a secure location (i.e. key vault).
apiKey.infoB: Your API key grants unrestricted access to your form. Do not give out your API key to anyone.
apiKey.infoC: The API key should ONLY be used for automated system interactions. Do not use your API key for user based access
apiKey.deleteMsg: Are you sure you wish to delete your API Key?

manageVersions.infoA: If there are no published versions, users are unable to access this form until there is a published version assigned. Once a version is published, that version is no longer editable. You must create a new version based on one of the previous form versions to continue editing.
manageVersions.infoB: Note: Only one version can be published.
manageVersions.infoC: Please publish or delete your latest draft version before starting a new version.
manageVersions.infoD: Please edit, publish or delete the existing draft before starting a new draft.
manageVersions.infoE: Unpublishing this form will take the form out of circulation until a version is published again.
manageVersions.infoF: Are you sure you wish to delete this Version?

addOwner.infoA: This should only be done in the event that the current form owner is no longer active or is out of contact in a priority event. Otherwise have the current Owner or a Team Administrator for the form do this themselves.
addOwner.hint: To find the User ID needed you can go to the 'USERS' tab in the Admin portal and search for them.
addOwner.label: User ID (guid)

adminFormsTable.noDataText: There are no forms in your system

administerForm.confirmDeletionMsg: Are you sure you want to delete this API Key?
